actions.text: Referred to the Committee on House Oversight, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Legislative and Budget Process.

official_title: To provide that the voters of the United States be given the right, through advisory voter initiative, to propose the enactment and repeal of Federal laws in a national election.
short_title: National Advisory Voter Initiative Act of 1995
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: National Advisory Voter Initiative Act of 1995 - States that U.S. voters shall have the right through advisory voter initiative to propose the enactment or repeal of Federal laws in a national election. Sets forth: (1) petition and ballot procedures; (2) State reimbursement provisions (including authorization of appropriations); and (3) congressional action requirements.

titles.title: National Advisory Voter Initiative Act of 1995
To provide that the voters of the United States be given the right, through advisory voter initiative, to propose the enactment and repeal of Federal laws in a national election.
